titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4516) making appropriations for the Legislative Branch for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2001, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-685, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 4516 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Waives points of order against provisions of the bill for failure to comply with clause 2 of rule XXI. Measure will be read by paragraph. Specified amendments are in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 242.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 530.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 173 (Roll no. 311).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/20/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R.4516 (legislative branch appropriations).
